power.title: Agile Recovery
power.fluff: With a quick leap, you are back on your feet and ready to act

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You stand up from prone.

power.title: Anticipate Maneuvers
power.fluff: You read your opponent like an open book and outsmart it

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Check:
section.text: Insight vs. Bluff

section.name: Success:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to you for the first attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Arcane Mutterings
power.fluff: You launch into a recitation of obscure lore on a subject to impress, cow, or trick your audience

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You need to make a Bluff, a Diplomacy, or an Intimidate check

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Arcana skill check modifier in place of the triggering skill's check modifier.

power.title: Arcane Senses
power.fluff: You refocus your eyes to see magic energy invisible to the untrained eye, learning how many magical creatures are nearby

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of the following two effects when you use this power:
► For each creature you currently see, you learn whether that creature has the elemental, fey, or shadow origin.

► You learn the number of elemental, fey, and shadow creatures within a number of squares of you equal to 5 + your Arcana skill check modifier. You don't learn the creatures' locations, but you do learn separate counts for each origin and whether there are solo creatures of that type present.

power.title: Battle Feint
power.fluff: Your sudden move causes the enemy to flinch, settung up your ally's next attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Check:
section.text: Bluff vs. Insight

section.name: Success:
section.text: One ally adjacent to you gains combat advantage against the target for the ally's first attack against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Bounding Leap
power.fluff: As you spring through the air, you tuck in your legs and arms, spinning to eke out a little extra distance

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an Athletics check to jump. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance you jump can exceed your speed.

power.title: Calculated Acumen
power.fluff: Your understanding of battle reveals what your enemy tries to avoid

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one enemy you can see that is within 10 squares of you.
You learn the vulnerabilities and other weaknesses of the chosen creature.

power.title: Cave Sense
power.fluff: You close your eyes, focusing on the sounds and the air flow to give you a rough mental picture of the cavern ahead

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You learn the general layout of terrain features in the burst.
You cannot sense through solid objects, such as cave walls, but you do sense around corners and into narrow gaps.
Additionally, you can make Perception checks to detect hidden creatures, objects, and traps in the burst as though you were within 10 squares of them.

power.title: City Rat
power.fluff: Like a rat, you are particularly skilled at using the environment, as well as your companions, to stay out of sight

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have cover against at least one creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a Stealth check to hide, using your Streetwise check modifier in place of your Stealth check modifier for the check.

power.title: Damning Secret
power.fluff: Picking up on tiny tell-tale signs, you divine a critical weakness in your foe's determination

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make an Intimidate check against a single target that shares a language with you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Insight check modifier in place of your Intimidate check modifier for the triggering check.

power.title: Deep Shadows
power.fluff: Judging the play of shadows against the cave wall, you spot a hiding place that an untrained explorer would overlook

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be underground, and have cover or concealment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a Stealth check to hide, using your Dungeoneering check modifier in place of your Stealth check modifier for the check.

power.title: Elude Senses
power.fluff: You slip past the notice of creatures that have adapted to life underground

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, creatures can't use blindsight or tremorsense to detect you, and you have concealment against creatures relying on darkvision. You can be detected with other senses as normal.

power.title: Endure Pain
power.fluff: You grin and bear it, shrugging off the pain of a new wound

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist all against the triggering attack. The resist equals one-half the number of healing surges you have remaining.

power.title: Exemplar of Valor
power.fluff: You brace yourself against the terror inspired by a foe, and your bravery serves as an example to your friends

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are the target of a Fear effect

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst that can see you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, each target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against Fear effects.

If the triggering attack hits you, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack misses you, target allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Failed Diplomacy
power.fluff: Negotiations are breaking down and will end in bloodshed - you realize this fact a split-second before your enemies do

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Initiative is rolled

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains the following two benefits:
► +2 power bonus to the triggering Initiative check.
► Combat advantage against all enemies that have not yet acted. This lasts until the end of the targets next turn.

power.title: Faith Healing
power.fluff: Your prayers help an ally recover their will to fight

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can use his or her second wind without spending an action.

power.title: False Bravado
power.fluff: Your apparent courage makes your enemy think twice about pressing its attack

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be marked.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You are no longer marked.

power.title: Far Sight
power.fluff: You focus your senses to pick out enemies at the edge of your vision

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, your ranged attack rolls take no penalty from long range, and ignore cover and concealment (not superior cover or total concealment) at normal range.
